description: This source file implements the 'DownloadManagerHttpClient' class, handling HTTP downloads via libcurl, including initialization, file download with progress and cancellation support, and cleanup.

classes.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient
classes.description: Class responsible for managing HTTP downloads, utilizing libcurl for network operations, including download progress tracking, cancellation, and error handling.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient()
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the libcurl handle and sets initial states.

methods.name: ~DownloadManagerHttpClient()
methods.description: Destructor that cleans up the libcurl handle and releases resources.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient::Status downloadFile(const std::string & url,const std::string & fileName,uint32_t rateLimit)
methods.description: Performs the file download from the specified URL with optional rate limiting, handling lock management, progress, and error reporting.

methods.name: size_t progressCb(void * ptr,double dltotal,double dlnow,double ultotal,double ulnow)
methods.description: Callback for libcurl to report download progress, updating internal progress state, and supporting cancellation.

methods.name: size_t write_data(void * ptr,size_t size,size_t nmemb,FILE * stream)
methods.description: Callback for libcurl to write received data into a file.

ctags.name: progressCb
ctags.pattern: /^size_t DownloadManagerHttpClient::progressCb(void *ptr, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ult/
